1541.content:
"No more crumpets for you, young lady!" Taylor joked to herself, imagining what her mother would have said in a cartoonishly exaggerated British accent. Her parents found this particular portion of her humor annoying, but Taylor couldn't help what she found funny. Besides, no one else was around to hear it. However, the reason for her quip remained.

Over the course of the last four years, Taylor had been living with her boyfriend, Jason, while she attended college. She'd been trying to avoid gaining weight, but it had slowly started creeping up on her. It wasn't much at first—if it got too high, she'd work (most of) it off soon enough—but lately, her efforts had slackened. She wasn't exercising as much anymore, wasn't watching what she ate as closely anymore, and it was going straight to her waistline.

And so, here she stood, trying to overcome the obstacle that all who have found themselves a bit rounder than before must overcome—the buttoning of her jeans. Gradually, they had become harder and harder to put on, but she always managed to do so. With a final effort, Taylor passed the button through the loop and zipped up her jeans. Exhaling slowly, Taylor checked the button. It still held, but it was quite strained. Adjusting her black Deadpool T-shirt over the waistband, Taylor looked at her reflection.

A new muffin top had formed around her waist, sticking out fairly prominently from beneath her shirt. Her jeans were a lot tighter around her lower body, slowly transforming into skinny jeans. Her belly pooched out, threatening to spill over her waistband. Her arms were losing their toning, and the Deadpool logo on her shirt seemed a bit stretched (although not by much, Taylor sadly noted). With dread, Taylor went to the bathroom, pulled out the scale, and hopped on. The numbers flashed, adjusted, then stopped.

140 lbs.

Taylor had gained 10 pounds of pure fat.

In the kitchen, Taylor could hear sizzling. Jason was making pancakes. Her stomach growled hungrily, wanting breakfast. Taylor made her way to the kitchen.

"Mornin', Tay," greeted Jason, smiling. "You're just in time." He put down a plate stacked with three large flapjacks drenched in butter and syrup in front of Taylor.

It's no wonder I've been gaining weight. Jason, sweet as he is, always seems to make too much food for me.

"Jason," Taylor said, "don't you think this is a bit… much?"

"No. Is it?" Jason's expression took a turn for the worried.

"Oh, no, not at all! It's just…"

"What? What is it?"

"… Nothing," Taylor answered, shaking her head. She wasn't ready to confront her weight gain just yet. Grabbing a knife and fork, she dug in.

Jason, for his part, only had a bowl of cereal. This was something Taylor found strange—for someone who always gave her such a large breakfast, he ate fairly little himself.

By the time she was finished, Taylor was quite stuffed. She felt like she wouldn't need to eat anything for the rest of her life. She also felt the button of her jeans no longer attached to them. It lay on her seat, face-down. Palming it, Taylor got up gently. Giving Jason a smile and a quick kiss, she returned to her room, changed into some stretch pants, grabbed her bags, and left for her first class of the day.

Sara smiled as she and her friends walked inside. When Clara saw Sara she looked her over. She thought Emily’s body looked like an apple, while her body looked like a light bulb, thin at the top with a round, fat bottom, but she compared Sara's body to a bowling pin. Emily said with a big smile.

"It's nice to meet you, too," Sara said smiling. "And of course it's always nice to see you Clara...anyways, this is Chad and Amy."

"H-Hi...I'm Amy...it's-uh, nice to meet both of you." If Sara a bowling pin, Amy was the bowling ball. She was at least a foot shorter than Clara and about twice her weight. She had brown eyes and black hair that she wore up in pig tales. She obviously was rather subconscious about her weight. She was wearing a loose black and white horizontally striped long sleeved shirt with a small neck hole, with very baggy blue jeans. It was also very clear that she was trying to suck in her stomach.

The man standing next to her smiled. "And that would make me Chad," Chad was about the same height as Kevin but was more lanky than him. "And don't mind Amy, she's a little awkward at first, but she's as sweet as they come!"

"I can tell, everything about her screams it." Emily said with her hand stretched out.

"Th-Thank you...I think." Amy said before shaking her hand.

"Well I think I'll leave you four to get acquainted, while me and Kevin go out and have a bite to eat!" Sara said, looking at a confused Kevin.

"Hold on, I thought we were going to stay here?" Kevin asked with a raised eyebrow.

"We were, but now that I see how well they all get along I don't think we're needed."

"Uh, that sounds okay, are you guys okay with it?" Kevin asked, looking the group of (hopefully) soon to be friends.

"I don't mind, you two have fun!" Chad said before sitting down.

Amy raised a hand. "Um, actually-"

"Oh I would never do that, I would be giving up Way too much!" Sara said, leaning in close to Kevin.

She felt the cold autumn breeze chilled her spine as she decided to put on her hat from her bag. She began to walk to the bus stop 50 meters ahead there a 20 or so waited on the Cowden line bus. In England the public transportation is very reliable, school children take the same bus like everyone else, some take the underground train or a bloody cab.

As Jenna walked she felt a comfortable feeling as she walked in the cold breeze. Yesterday and before she began to shake when she walked out in the cold. Maybe the extra fat gave a little insulation against the cold? Before it was just skin between her and her bones and she had to dress in a winter jacket every early winter. Nevermind.

When the red bus rolled into it stops people went out and people went in with their cards on the magnetic ticket pad. She placed her card at the front of the bus and hid it down again in her wallet in her bag. Jenna took her usual seat at the back and when she did she felt her gut bulged forward and straining the upper button!
It was rather uncomfortable but felt she could do nothing when the bus was almost full.
A while later the bus stopped and some passengers went on and some off, but this was not her stop no, it was here crush at school usually went on to her school. Harry.

She saw him at the front looking for a seat, and Jenna had one open next to her. Omg, what... will happen now she thought. this could be her move!
She decided to...

info.brief_description: Create a girl and make her gain.
info.description:
First we start with the rules and I will decide what is acceptable not YOU!

They can only gain weight, they may not be inflated or stuff like that it has to be normal weight gain, but! They can gain weight through... 'Different means like force feeing, magic, etc.

Only females can gain but guys can be in the story's.

The story can never end, even if they become immobile find a way to keep the story going, like have the character who is immobile try to find a way to become mobile again or make her the leader of a group that wants to make all the females on earth fat or maybe even the galaxy, I really don't care what it is just keep the story going.

This should be implied after the last rule but, no killing off the main girl.

Stay true to the character don't go changing their character to drastically in the middle of the story.

Nothing gross like pooping, peeing, farting, or burping. They still have to do the first two but don't write about it and the last two are okay just don't go crazy.

Sex is okay just don't write into it tooo much.

Please add a reasonably sized chapter.

If you don't follow any of the above rule or any thing else I don't like I will remove your addition.
